output: html_document

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
url <- ("https://www.baseball-reference.com/awards/hof_2025.shtml")
html <- read_html(url)
tables <- html_table(html)
library(Lahman)
head(HallOfFame, 3)
head(tables[[1]], 3)
data <- tables[[1]]
actual_col_names <- data[1, ]
colnames(data) <- actual_col_names
data <- data[-1, ]
head(data, 3)
summary(data)
data$Votes <- as.numeric(data$Votes)
data <- gsub("X-", "", data$Name)

head(People, 3)


hof25 <- data %>% (
  yearID = 2025, 
  votedBy = BBWAA,
  ballots = 394, 
  needed = 296, 
  votes = data$Votes
)
```
